```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

#We will explore the Health Systems Engineering Dataset:

```{r}
Original_Data <- read.csv("HSE_Data.csv")
Original_Data
```
```{r}
view(Original_Data)
```

Reshaping the Data ?

#Data Summaries

#Create Sodium Data Table
```{r}
Sodium_Data <- Original_Data %>%
select(Sodium,Sodium.missing.flag)
Sodium_Data
```
#What does “missing sodium” represent – how is the data “managed”?
```{r}
Sodium_Data%>%
  filter(Sodium.missing.flag == "Yes")
```


```
```{r}
Sodium_count <- Sodium_Data%>%
  count("Sodium")
Sodium_count
```



#Data Visualization

Create a histogram for all Sodium data points
```{r}
Sodium_Data %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x= Sodium_count))
```
